item.description: brides and grooms have plenty of motivation to lose weight, but they need to allow plenty of time, too.

item.title: uganda police open fire as nigeria leader's car stoned

item.title: power surge carries yankees past tigers
item.description: curtis granderson and mark teixeira each blasted home runs to power the new york yankees to a 6-3 victory over the detroit tigers thursday to open the 2011 major league baseball season in emphatic style.

item.title: no laws needed for german nuclear deal suspension
item.description: german chancellor angela merkel will suspend on monday a deeply unpopular agreement to delay closing the nation's nuclear power stations, due to the crisis at a japanese plant, sources in her coalition said.

item.title: solomons' gold mine set to reshape south pacific nation
item.description: elijah david traipsed the 55 km in plastic sandals from his home in guadalcanal province to the only gold mine in solomon islands, hoping to find work that may transform his life and that of his south pacific island nation, for better or perhaps worse.
